data.message: i dont appreciate. my rymes being stolen and raped .like a ho with a sweet set of legs .hold it just wait let me get a hold of my plate.these dogs are hungry and because im just late. they already ate.i got the heart of the greats. i started a clean slate bardered and made, my way to the top like a marter just hanged.pardon my ways, but im guarding my flow like a national guard at the lake. dont say your an artist with the art to write my bars like you wrote me behind bars up arkansas state..your not an artist your fake.
